Exhaust.

Exhaust.

Deal 3 damage.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.

Exhaust.

cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Apply 1 Weak.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Exhaust.

If the enemy has positive Strength, steal up to 2 (3) of it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Swordfish
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Deal 4 damage.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Exhaust.

cards.name: The Eternity Gem
cards.description:
Deal 11 (12) damage to a random enemy 11 (12) times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: The Gem Search
cards.description:
fishing:Quest: End your turn with an empty hand.
Reward: Shuffle The Eternity Gem into your draw pile.

cards.name: The Whale
cards.description:
Enemy loses 20 HP.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Stone
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is Exhausted, deal 9 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Cast Line
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Shuffle 1 (2) fishing:Fish into your draw pile.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Bag of Defends
cards.description:
Gain 6 (8) Block X times.
When (Stuffed) you (with) remove a Defend from your deck, Upgrade this (Defends).

cards.name: Baited
cards.description:
Deal 14 (20) damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, add 2 fishing:Fish into your hand.

cards.name: Cardboard Bullets
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Deals 2 less damage for each other card in your hand.

cards.name: Double Up
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage twice.
Startup: ALL enemies lose 4 (6) HP.

cards.name: Future Proofing
cards.description:
Deal 7 (9) damage to ALL enemies.
Upgrade 1 (2) random card (cards) in your draw pile for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Hunker Down
cards.description:
Gain 1 (3) Block.
If you have played less than 3 cards this turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Maybe Later
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage.
Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
If you do, gain 6 (8) Block.

cards.name: Mop Up
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Exhaust a card.
If it's a Status or Curse card, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Nostalgic Strike
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Put a random card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Oblivious
cards.description:
Gain 6 (9) Block.
Add 1 fishing:Fish into your hand.

cards.name: Perfect Pull
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
Draw 1 card.
If you drew a fishing:Foil card this way, deal 7 (10) damage again.

cards.name: Plant Flag
cards.description:
Gain 4 (7) Block.
Put a fishing:Foil Flag on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Rod Slam
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
Next turn,
draw 1 less card.

cards.name: Set Sail
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Discard 1 card.
Gain 2 (4) Vigor.

cards.name: Shiny Shots
cards.description:
Deal 5 (6) damage 3 times.
Gain 2 (3) Block for each fishing:Foil card in your hand.

cards.name: That's All, Folks!
cards.description:
Deal 10 (13) damage.
fishing:Solo: Play the top card of your draw pile.

cards.name: Thorny Personality
cards.description:
Gain 8 (11) Block.
Gain 1 Thorns.
fishing:Voyaged: Gain 2 more Thorns.

cards.name: Wander
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Choose a card from your draw pile to put on top.

cards.name: All Out
cards.description:
Discard 1 card.
At the end of your turn, if your hand is empty, deal 7 (9) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Aqua Orb
cards.description:
Apply 1 (2) Weak to ALL enemies.
Gain 11 (12) Block.
If your discard pile is empty, gain 1 Artifact.

cards.name: Bobber
cards.description:
Gain 7 (8) Block.
If you draw this during your turn, gain 7 (8) Block and 1 (2) Strength.

cards.name: Box of Havoc
cards.description:
Apply 3 (5) Poison to ALL enemies.
fishing:Solo: Apply 3 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Cannoneer
cards.description: Deal 8 (11) damage to a random enemy X times.

cards.name: Catch of the Day
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the end of your turn, put a fishing:Fish on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Decked Out
cards.description:
Add 2 (3) Shivs and a fishing:Foil Smite into your hand.
If you're on Steam Deck, Upgrade them.

cards.name: Fasting-B
cards.description:
Gain 4 (5) Thorns.
Gain 4 (5) Plated Armor.
At the start of your turn, discard 1 card.

cards.name: First Class
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the start of your turn, add a fishing:Foil Flight into your hand.

cards.name: Flaming Flip
cards.description:
Gain 5 (8) Block.
Exhaust 1 card.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Free Drinks
cards.description:
ALL enemies lose 2 (3) Strength.
Exhaust.
When you obtain this, obtain a random Potion.

cards.name: Garlic Clove
cards.description:
Remove your Weak, Vulnerable, and Frail.
If you're not a Vampire, heal 4 (6) HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Glitter Glue
cards.description:
Deal 6 (10) damage.
Apply 2 Weak.
When you obtain this, make it and a random card in your deck fishing:Foil.

cards.name: Hook
cards.description:
Deal 8 (9) damage.
Deals 4 (5) additional damage for each Colorless card played this turn.

cards.name: Lie
cards.description:
ALL enemies lose 4 (6) Strength this turn.
Add a Cheat into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mint Condition
cards.description: fishing:Foil cards deal 3 (4) more damage and grant 3 (4) more Block.

cards.name: Preclude
cards.description:
Opener.
Deal 15 (20) damage.
Discard 1 card.
Reset all Time Warp.

cards.name: Pyramid Climb
cards.description:
Gain 13 (17) Block.
Shuffle a Stone into your draw pile.

cards.name: Reserves
cards.description: After you play a cost X card, gain [E].

cards.name: Ridiculous Fishing
cards.description: Whenever you play a fishing:Fish, deal 3 (5) damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Ring the Bell
cards.description:
(Ethereal.)
ALL enemies lose 13 HP.
Put a Curse of the Bell on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Setdown
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.
It costs 0 until played.

cards.name: Shimmering Shield
cards.description:
Gain 6 (9) Block.
Whenever you play a fishing:Foil card this turn, add a Shiv into your hand.

cards.name: Ship Ram
cards.description:
Deal 18 (22) damage.
fishing:Voyaged: Deal 33 (40) damage instead.

cards.name: Shopping Strike
cards.description:
Deal 8 (9) damage.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.
When (Thanks) you (for) purchase a Relic, Upgrade this. (shopping!)

cards.name: Sole Searching
cards.description:
Scry 2 (3).
fishing:Solo: Gain 2 (3) Strength.

cards.name: Splash
cards.description:
Gain 13 (16) Block.
Deal 13 (16) damage.
This card's damage and Block are reduced by 2 for each other card in your hand.

cards.name: Standoff
cards.description:
Gain 7 (8) Block.
Increase this card's Block by 3 (4) this combat.

cards.name: The Fish-O-Pedia
cards.description:
Gain 6 (10) Block.
fishing:Quest: Play 3 different kinds of fishing:Fish.
Reward:
Gain 3 Strength.

cards.name: The Lucky Pack
cards.description:
Deal 9 (13) damage.
fishing:Quest: Play 3 fishing:Foil cards in a turn.
Reward: Gain 3 Plated Armor.

cards.name: The Storm
cards.description:
Next turn,
gain [E] [E] ( [E]).

Reward: A random enemy loses 17 HP.

cards.description:
Add 1 fishing:Fish into your hand.
Startup: Gain 12 (16) Gold.

cards.name: Waka Waka
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Deal 8 (9) damage.
Startup: Shuffle 2 Power Pellets into your draw pile.

cards.name: Whaling
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
If you have over 200 Gold, spend 15 (8) to gain an extra 1 Strength.

cards.name: Wizardry
cards.description:
Gain 4 (6) Vigor.
Whenever you draw this card, put a fishing:Foil Pinball on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: X Marks the Spot
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 3 cost X cards of any color to add into your hand.
 (Gain [E].)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Angler Form
cards.description:
Retain.
The first 3 (4) times you play a card each turn, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Caffeinated
cards.description:
~~- fishing:Unnate. -~~
At the start of your turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
cards.description:
Heal 5 (6) HP.
Gain 1 (2) Dexterity.
Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Collector
cards.description: At the end of your turn, if you played 3 or more fishing:Foil cards, gain 2 (3) Strength.

cards.name: Confetti Cannon
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage to a random enemy.
Draw 1 card.
If you drew a fishing:Foil card this way, repeat this.

cards.name: Ends Of The Earth
cards.description:
Can be played from your discard pile.
Gain 2 (3) Block.
Deal 5 (6) damage.

cards.name: Finishing Touches
cards.description:
Discard 2 cards.
When you play a card, if it's the only card in your hand, play it twice.

cards.name: Fishbones
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Deals 2 (3) additional damage for each card in your exhaust pile.

cards.name: Gone Fishing
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Put 3 (5) fishing:Fish on top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: It Was THIIIIIS Big!
cards.description:
Add 1 fishing:Fish into your hand.
Double the effects of ALL current fishing:Fish.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rated X
cards.description:
Deal 7 (8) damage.
X >= 1: Gain 7 (8) Block.
X >= 2:
Apply 2 (3) Vulnerable.
X >= 4:
Gain 3 (4) Strength.

cards.name: Rod of Hope
cards.description:
Deal 12 (18) damage.
fishing:Voyaged: Gain [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: The Backpack
cards.description:
Gain 8 (12) Block.
Discard your hand.
Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: The Final Card
cards.description:
fishing:Solo: Deal 21 (27) damage to ALL enemies.
If (Thanks) this (for) card ends the combat, Upgrade it (playing).

cards.name: The Harpoon
cards.description:
Deal 28 (36) damage.
Startup fishing:Quest:
Kill an enemy.
Reward: Add The Whale into your hand.

cards.name: The Prismatic Portal
cards.description:
(Innate.)
fishing:Quest: Play a Rare card.
Reward: Shuffle The Gem Search into your draw pile.

cards.name: Three (Four) of a Kind
cards.description:
Choose a card in your draw pile.
Shuffle 2 (3) fishing:Foil copies into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Vexing Deal
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and Exhaust 1 card.
If it's Ascension 10 or higher, gain 1 Strength.

relics.name: The Rod
relics.description: Upgrade the first 3 unupgraded fishing:Foil cards you draw each combat.
relics.flavorText: The only one of its kind.

relics.name: Unagee Skull
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add 1 Fish into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Known to guard sunken ships long ago.

relics.name: Goggles
relics.description: Whenever you end your turn with an empty hand, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: "We may now cross the Sands." - Kublai the Great

relics.name: Signpost
relics.description: The first time you play a Power card each combat, gain 6 Block and [E] .

relics.name: Lucky Ring
relics.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, draw 1 card and gain [E] [E] .
relics.flavorText: The eye blinks just when you start to look away.

relics.name: Newsletter
relics.description: The merchant's cards are fishing:Foil, Upgraded, and cost 25% less.
relics.flavorText: "Peculiar! A shimmering cube of false promises." - Ranwid

relics.name: Old Bobber
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Colorless cards in a single turn, deal 7 damage to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Broken Oar
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
At the start of combat, shuffle 4 Shivs into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Most trips to the Spire are one-way.

relics.name: Final Results
relics.description: At the start of combat, add an Upgraded fishing:Foil Miracle, Smite, and Safety into your hand.
relics.flavorText: You were never gonna get it.

relics.name: Rainbow Rod
relics.description:
Replaces The Rod.
Upgrade the first 2 unupgraded cards you draw each turn.

relics.name: Maelstrom Ankh
relics.description: You no longer find Boots, Guppies, or Piranhas.

potions.name: Starlight Soda
potions.description: Remove your Weak, Vulnerable, and Frail. Scry 3.

potions.name: Care Package
potions.description: Add Smite, Safety and a Shiv to your hand. Heal 6 HP.

keywords.name: Fish
keywords.description: Fish are Colorless 0 cost cards that confer a bonus effect, draw a card, and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Foil
keywords.description:
In each card reward, 1 of the cards will be Foil.
Shiny!

keywords.name: Quest
keywords.description:
When you complete a Quest, obtain its associated Reward.
If you already have that Quest in progress, draw 1 card instead.

keywords.name: Solo
keywords.description: Effect triggers only if there are no other cards in your hand.

keywords.name: Unnate
keywords.description: Starts each combat at the bottom of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Voyaged
keywords.description: Effect triggers only if you drew this card during your turn, outside of the opening draw.

mods.name: The Adventurer
mods.description: Adds a new playable character: The Adventurer.
